item.title: Switching to Scrivener for WordPress blogging
item.description: I’ve just made the switch - or as we speak, I’m starting to learn about this ‘new’ tool for writers called Scrivener.

item.title: SEO best practice for using <strong> and <em>
item.description: As more people become aware of HTML5 it’s time to review how tagging written content will impact search engine optimisation.

item.title: Ideas using Foursquare for Travel Professionals
item.description: As travel professionals know, your customers want holiday experiences to always remember and preferably off the beaten trail.

item.title: How to choose a good social media marketing consultant
item.description: Social media marketing is no longer a buzzword and many brands and businesses are choosing to recruit full-time staff to develop and deliver the quicksilver successes of the best viral campaigns.

item.title: Task Management with Post-It Notes
item.description: As I’m a certified Scrum Master and very good at project and task management I can say I enjoy running planning sessions with teams I do work with.

item.title: Are Twitter Followers better than Fans?
item.description: Are Twitter Followers better than Facebook Fans was a topic discussed on emarketer recently.
